---
format:
  html:
    meta:
      viewport: "width=device-width, initial-scale=1"
---

<style>
  *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; }
  body {
    margin: 0;
    position: relative;
    min-height: 100svh;
    /* background-image: url("quant_image.png"); /* Fallback image */
    background-size: cover;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: center;
  }

  .overlay-text {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 10%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    color: #fff;
  }

  /* Styling for your name */
  .overlay-text h1 {
    font-size: 4rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    margin: 0 0 1rem 0;
  }

  /* Styling for the button */
  .overlay-text .cta-button {
    display: inline-block;
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
    color: #000;
    padding: 0.6rem 1.2rem;
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    border-radius: 2rem;
    text-decoration: none;
  }
  .overlay-text .cta-button:hover {
    background-color: #fff;
  }

#bg-video {
  position: absolute;        /* or fixed if you truly want it behind everything */
  top: 0; left: 0;
  width: 100%;               /* fill the containerâ€™s width */
  height: 100%;              /* keep its aspect ratio */
  object-fit: cover;       /* fill the viewport; may crop to preserve aspect */
  z-index: -1;
}


  /* Mobile tweaks */
  @media (max-width: 600px) {
    .overlay-text {
      top: 55%;
      left: 5%;
      transform: translateY(-50%);
      padding-right: 6%;
    }
    .overlay-text h1 {
      font-size: 2.25rem; /* scale down heading on phones */
      line-height: 1.15;
    }
    .overlay-text .cta-button {
      display: inline-block;
      padding: 0.8rem 1.2rem; /* larger tap target */
      font-size: clamp(1.8rem, 4vw, 4rem);
      min-height: 44px; /* accessibility target size */
      border-radius: 1.5rem;
    }
  }

  /* Respect reduced motion preferences: replace video with a static image */
  @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
    #bg-video { display: none; }
    body { background-image: url("quant_image.png"); }
  }
</style>

<video autoplay muted loop playsinline id="bg-video" poster="quant_image.png" preload="none">
  <source src="vidtest.mp4" type="video/mp4">
</video>

<div class="overlay-text">
  <h1>Welcome</h1>
  <a class="cta-button" href="chain_link.qmd">Try ChainLink</a>
</div>
